info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 7:45PM CST until February 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with some gusts over 30 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arkansas, including the Ozark Mountains. * WHEN...Through midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
